code: import history from"@history.js";import jwtAuthService from"../../services/jwtAuthService";export var SET_USER_DATA="USER_SET_DATA";export var REMOVE_USER_DATA="USER_REMOVE_DATA";export var USER_LOGGED_OUT="USER_LOGGED_OUT";export function setUserData(user){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_USER_DATA,data:user});};}export function logoutUser(){return function(dispatch){jwtAuthService.logout();history.push({pathname:"/session/signin"});dispatch({type:USER_LOGGED_OUT});};}
